# GenuVerity

> GenuVerity is an independent fact-checking and open-source intelligence (OSINT) platform. We investigate disinformation, political claims, health misinformation, and emerging information threats using primary sources, data analysis, and digital forensics. Every report includes full source attribution and a transparent verdict.

- Website: https://www.genuverity.com
- Reports: 198
- Updated: 2026-02-11

## Site Pages

- [Home](https://www.genuverity.com/): Main page with latest reports carousel and search
- [All Reports](https://www.genuverity.com/reports.html): Full searchable archive of all fact-check reports
- [Newsfeed](https://www.genuverity.com/newsfeed.html): Latest reports in feed format

## Conspiracy & Hoaxes

- [Montana 'Pedophile Bonfire' Hoax](https://www.genuverity.com/montana-pedophile-bonfire-2025): FALSE: Viral claims about a 'pedophile bonfire' event in Montana are completely fabricated. No police reports, news coverage, or evidence exists. Montana law enforcement confirmed no such event occ... [Verdict: False] [Jan 2, 2025] [16 Sources]
- [Epstein Young Women Archive Photos: Viral Misattributions](https://www.genuverity.com/epstein-archive-photos-2025): MISLEADING: Viral photos claimed to be from Epstein archives were frequently misattributed or manipulated. While genuine court documents were released in January 2024, accompanying images on social... [Verdict: Misleading] [Jan 2, 2025] [16 Sources]
- [Maui 'Weather Weapons' Experiment](https://www.genuverity.com/maui-weather-weapons-2025): FALSE: Debunking viral claims that HAARP or directed energy weapons caused the 2023 Maui wildfires. [Verdict: False] [Jan 3, 2025] [12 Sources]
- [Hobby Lobby 'Demon' Merchandise Claims Debunked](https://www.genuverity.com/hobby-lobby-demon-merchandise-2025): FALSE: Viral claims that Hobby Lobby sells demonic merchandise were debunked. Investigation reveals misidentified products. [Verdict: False] [Jan 3, 2025] [12 Sources]
- ['The Internet Died in 2016' Theory](https://www.genuverity.com/dead-internet-theory-2025): FALSE: The Dead Internet Theory claiming most online content is AI-generated bots is debunked. Evidence shows the internet remains human-driven. [Verdict: False] [Jan 3, 2025] [12 Sources]
- [Barilla 'Insect Flour' Claims: EU Regulations vs. Social Media Panic](https://www.genuverity.com/barilla-insect-flour-2025): FALSE: Viral claims that Barilla pasta contains insect flour were debunked. Analysis of EU insect protein regulations shows standard food labeling. [Verdict: False] [Jan 3, 2025] [12 Sources]
- [D.C. Mid-Air Collision Misinfo](https://www.genuverity.com/dc-midair-collision-misinfo-2025): MIXED: The D.C. mid-air collision tragedy was accompanied by multiple misinformation narratives. Claims blaming DEI hiring policies are unsupported by evidence. Conspiracy theories about deliberate... [Verdict: Mixed] [Jan 30, 2025] [16 Sources]
- [Trump Labor Day Death Hoax: Bizarre Conspiracy Theory Debunked](https://www.genuverity.com/trump-dead-labor-day-2025): FALSE: A bizarre conspiracy theory claiming Trump died on Labor Day was quickly debunked. [Verdict: False] [Jan 2, 2026] [16 Sources]

- [Patriot Front 'Federal Agents' Claim: Conspiracy Theory Debunked](https://www.genuverity.com/patriot-front-agents-claim-2025): FALSE: Claims that Patriot Front members are federal agents have been debunked. [Verdict: False] [Jan 2, 2026] [16 Sources]
- [Epstein Files Fabrication: Sorting Truth From Viral Hoaxes](https://www.genuverity.com/epstein-files-fabrication-2025): MIXED: Claims about fabricated Epstein files mixed legitimate documents with viral hoaxes in 2025. [Verdict: Mixed] [Jan 2, 2026] [16 Sources]
- [Target 'Satanic' Campaign: How Viral Claims Misrepresented Products](https://www.genuverity.com/target-satanic-campaign-2025): MISLEADING: Coordinated social media campaigns falsely claimed Target sold 'satanic' merchandise. [Verdict: Misleading] [Jan 3, 2026] [12 Sources]
- [The FireAid Laundering Complex: Wildfire Charity Funds Falsely Linked to 'Illegal Aliens'](https://www.genuverity.com/fireaid-charity-conspiracy-january-2026): A House GOP report questioning FireAid's fund distribution was distorted into viral claims that $100 million was stolen to fund 'illegal aliens.' Independent audit confirmed grants were distributed. [Verdict: Misleading] [Jan 15, 2026] [3 Sources]

Documented errors included wrong registration deadlines, ID requireme... [Verdict: Context Required] [Jan 2, 2025] [16 Sources]

## Fact Check

- [Did Elon Musk's DOGE Save $2 Trillion?](https://www.genuverity.com/doge-savings-claims): Examining DOGE's claim of $2 trillion in savings. NPR found only $102M verified—0.005% of claimed amount. Federal spending actually rose. [Verdict: undefined] [Dec 19, 2025] [15 Sources]
- [Trump's Grocery Prices Claim: Fact Check](https://www.genuverity.com/grocery-prices-claim): Trump claimed grocery prices are 'falling rapidly.' BLS data shows more items increased than decreased. Verdict: FALSE. [Verdict: undefined] [Dec 19, 2025] [10 Sources]
- [Hamas 51% Youth Support Claim](https://www.genuverity.com/hamas-youth-support): Viral claim that 51% of young Americans support Hamas is misleading. Original poll asked about sympathy, not support, and results are more nuanced. [Verdict: undefined] [Dec 19, 2025] [8 Sources]
- [Immigration Crime Wave: Claims vs Data](https://www.genuverity.com/immigration-crime-claims): Examining viral claims about immigrant crime rates. DOJ and academic research show immigrants commit crimes at lower rates than native-born citizens. [Verdict: undefined] [Dec 19, 2025] [10 Sources]
